title: The Wide-Awake Princess
description: The first book in a new series by the author of The Frog Princess, a delightful re-imagining of Sleeping Beauty.Princess Annie is frustratingly (and luckily) resistant to magic. When her sister Gwen pricks her finger and the whole castle falls asleep, only Annie stays awake. Now it's up to Annie to find a prince to kiss her sister and break the spell. But who is her sister's true love? And what about Annie's own happily-ever-after? Annie travels through a fairy tale land filled with characters both familiar and new in this original adventure from the beloved author of The Tales of the Frog Princess.Don't miss the rest of the Wide-Awake Princess series by E. D. Wide-Awake PrincessUnlocking the SpellThe Bravest PrincessPrincess in DisguisePrincess between WorldsThe Princess and the PearlPrincess before Dawn And these other magical Tales of the Frog Princess The Fairy-Tale Matchmaker More Than a Princess Magic Animal Rescue and more!
author: E.D. Baker
